mapper.select: /** getListOfInfo **/ SELECT `bad`.`id` ,`bad`.`store_id` ,`bad`.`cd` ,`bad`.`score` ,`cod`.`group` ,`cod`.`name` ,(SELECT `cod2`.name FROM tb_code `cod2` WHERE `cod`.id = `cod2`.ref_id) AS color FROM tb_badge `bad` LEFT JOIN tb_code `cod` ON `bad`.cd = `cod`.cd WHERE `bad`.store_id = #{storeId}
